abort.plc_not_existing: PLC with address `{address}` does not exist in scgi server

data.host: scgi server host (for cybroscgiserver addon use '85493909-cybroscgiserver')
data.port: scgi server port (for cybroscgiserver addon use '4000')
data.ignore_general_error:
Ignore 'general_error' from expansion unit.
if checked, all found devices will be add to home assistant, use at your own risk!

user.description:
Set up your HIQ-Home control to integrate with Home Assistant.
Before you continue make sure you had a running cybro scgi server!
See integration documentation for details.

data.ignore_general_error:
Ignore 'general_error' from expansion unit.
if checked, all found devices will be add to home assistant, use at your own risk!
